entry.title: Saturday: Clearing. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Clearing late this afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 14 January 2023
